qas.question: When did Canada get its first police?
What was Canada's first police force?
When was the Toronto police created?
When was the Montreal police created?
When were the first Mounties created?
When did Canada get its last police?
What wasn't Canada's first police force?
When was the Toronto police destroyed?
When was the Montreal police not created?
When were the first Mounties destroyed?

context: In Canada, the <a1_0><b6_0>Royal Newfoundland Constabulary<b6_0/><a1_0/> was founded in <a0_0><b5_0>1729<b5_0/><a0_0/>, making it the first police force in present-day Canada. It was followed in <a2_0><b7_0>1834<b7_0/><a2_0/> by the Toronto Police, and in <a3_0><b8_0>1838<b8_0/><a3_0/> by police forces in Montreal and Quebec City. A national force, the Dominion Police, was founded in 1868. Initially the Dominion Police provided security for parliament, but its responsibilities quickly grew. The famous Royal Northwest Mounted Police was founded in <a4_0><b9_0>1873<b9_0/><a4_0/>. The merger of these two police forces in 1920 formed the world-famous Royal Canadian Mounted Police.
